fields.name: CEO
fields.description: Responsible for overall strategic direction, decision-making, and leadership of the company.

fields.name: CTO
fields.description: Oversees the technological infrastructure, innovation, and ensures alignment with business goals.

fields.name: CFO
fields.description: Manages financial planning, risk management, and ensures the company's financial stability.

fields.name: SG
fields.description: Monitors and secures entry and exit points, ensuring safety and efficient vehicle movement.

fields.name: FS
fields.description: Supervises daily operations on the floor, ensuring smooth workflow and addressing immediate issues.

fields.name: OO
fields.description: Responsible for managing and coordinating operational tasks and logistics efficiently.

fields.name: WM
fields.description: Manages warehouse operations, including inventory control, storage, and staff oversight.

fields.name: ZM
fields.description: Oversees multiple collection centers and warehouses within a specific region for operational efficiency.

fields.name: SR
fields.description: Builds relationships with customers, manages sales processes, and ensures client satisfaction.
